availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bartlett Henson Hall (Hopkins County, ky, farmer and carpenter )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of Dixon Hall and Sarah Hall. Married to Minerva L. Hall. Father of Joseph W. Hall and Peter Hall. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 52A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 826.
"Bartlett Henson Hall (1834-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #62444951, accessed July 28, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/62444951.
